com.soctec.soctec.core

Class MainFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soctec.soctec.core.MainFragment

  • public class MainFragment
extends java.lang.Object
    MainFragment shows the QR-code and handles the rating system
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Robin Punell, Jesper Kjellqvist, Carl-Henrik Hult

      • enableRatingButtons

        public void enableRatingButtons()

      • disableRatingButtons

        public void disableRatingButtons()
        Disables the rating buttons and sets the "disabled"-image design for the button.

      • updateRatingBar

        public void updateRatingBar()
        Updates the progress of the rating bar. Only updates the rating bar every "ratingUpdateFreq"-time based on the number of ratings.

      • sendRatingToServer

        private void sendRatingToServer(boolean positiveRating)
        Tells NetworkHandler to send rating to server
        Parameters:
        positiveRating - true, if thumbs up was clicked. false if thumbs down
